CustomField.description: build formula to identify the attachments that should be requested when a registration location is added. This field is used by the Registration Child Object Attachment Request flow to create attachment requests
CustomField.formula: IF(Registration_Type__c == 'Car Wash', ';BL', '') & IF(Registration_Type__c == 'Car Wash', ';CW-FBNS', '') & IF(Registration_Type__c == 'Janitorial', ';JS-FBNS', '') & IF( Registration__r.RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Talent_Agency', ';TA-PC;TA-BTRC', '')
CustomField.label: Attachment Identifier
